title: Deadly Deception
description: Daisy is a British woman who got a scholarship from New York to finish her Master's degree. She lived a sheltered life with her brother. So, she takes the opportunity to break out of the shell and become independent like she has always wanted.Riccardo Ricci, aka "Triste Mietitore" (Grim Reaper), is an aristocratic, mysterious, and truly wile businessman. Well, if you count running the mafia a business. When you cross him, there is no other absolution than death, which is why he is the "Capo DI Tutti Capi" (Boss of the bosses).What happens when their world collides? A game of loyalty and survival begins. - Dark Romance- Explicit sexual content- Mature themes- Mafia- Anti-hero
author: Jasmine Rov
